channel.title: Francesc Camats
channel.description: Latest blog posts from Francesc Camats

item.title: Big Award!
item.description: Buenas, os informo que he conseguido el oro en el concurso de pintura Golden Kobold 2019, categoría de miniaturas pequeñas. Nos vemos pronto :) I’m happy to anounce that I am been the winner of the Golden Kobold 2019 for the single miniature small category. See you soon :)
